Description: Unique identifier for the user who submitted the review
Date when the review was submitted
User rating given in the review (e.g., 1-5 stars)
The textual content of the user review
Version of the Gojek app used by the user
Type of device used to submit the review (e.g., Android, iOS)
Sentiment label of the review (e.g., positive, negative, neutral) if available
Detected topic of the review (e.g., ride experience, app usability, service quality)
